A psalm written by David for Jeduthun, the choir leader
God is the only one who can give me peace in my inner being,
and he is the one who saves me
under which I can be safe
a wall that is about to fall over or a broken-down fence [MET].
My enemies plan to remove me from my important position so that people no longer honor me.
They bless people by what they say [MTY],
but in their inner beings they curse
God is the only one who gives me peace in my inner being;
he is the one whom I confidently expect
under which I can be safe
God is the one who saves me and honors me.
because he is ◄our refuge/the one who protects us► [MET].
People who are considered to be unimportant are
people who are considered to be important
If you put them all on a scale,
they weighed less than a puff of air.
Do not trust in money gained by extorting it from others;
do not try to gain anything by robbing others.
If you become very wealthy, do not trust in [IDM] your money.
I have heard God say more than once that he is the one who
and that he is the one who faithfully loves
according to the deeds that we do.
